scripts.test:ci: npm run cy:run:ci && npm run generate:report
scripts.test:local: npm run cy:run:local && npm run generate:report
scripts.generate:report: mochawesome-merge cypress/results/*.json > mochawesome.json && marge mochawesome.json --reportDir mochawesome-report --inline
scripts.test:clean: npm run clean:reports && npm run test:ci
scripts.open:report: open mochawesome-report/mochawesome.html || start mochawesome-report/mochawesome.html || xdg-open mochawesome-report/mochawesome.html
